2 import rospy
3 import subprocess
4 import shlex
5 import rosnode
6 import json
7 import rospkg

9 from multi_robot_sim.srv import MultiRobotSimSpawnRobot, MultiRobotSimSpawnRobotResponse, MultiRobotSimRobot, MultiRobotSimRobotResponse
10 from multi_robot_sim.msg import MultiRobotSimStatus
11 from gazebo_msgs.srv import GetModelProperties , DeleteModel
12 
13 from utils.osm_utils import OsmUtil
14 from enum import Enum
15 
16 import datetime
17 import os
18 import pandas as pd

20 class MovebaseStatus(Enum):
21  PENDING = 0
22  ACTIVE = 1
23  PREEMPTED = 2
24  SUCCEEDED = 3
25  ABORTED = 4
26  REJECTED = 5
27  PREEMPTING = 6
28  RECALLING = 7
29  RECALLED = 8
30  LOST = 9
31 
32 class BackendService():
33  def __init__(self):
34  """BackendService
35  This module implements a ROS service that intreacts with the simulator
36  """
37 
38  # Create Service
39  spawn_service = rospy.Service('spawn_robot',MultiRobotSimSpawnRobot,self.handle_spawn_robot)
40  del_service = rospy.Service('del_robot',MultiRobotSimRobot,self.handle_del_robot)
41  status_service = rospy.Service('robot_status',MultiRobotSimRobot,self.handle_robot_status)
42 
43  # Subscriber
44  status_sub = rospy.Subscriber("status", MultiRobotSimStatus, self.handle_status)
45 
46  # History cache
47  self.history = {}
48  self.log_data = []
49 
50  # osm utils
51  path = rospy.get_param("/yaml_path")
52  self.gg = OsmUtil(path)
53 
54  rospy.on_shutdown(self.handle_shut_down)
55 
56  rospy.loginfo("backend service started ...")
57  rospy.spin()
58 
59  def handle_shut_down(self):
60  """
61  This service save the logged data into a .csv file once the simulator ends
62  """
63 
64  if not self.log_data:
65  rospy.loginfo("no data found")
66  return
67 
68  columns_name = ["timestamp","robot_name","status code","status","xy_coordinate","GPS_coordinate"]
69 
70  rospack = rospkg.RosPack()
71  log_dir = os.path.join(rospack.get_path('multi_robot_sim'),'logs')
72 
73  try:
74  os.mkdir(log_dir)
75  except OSError as error:
76  pass
77 
78  date = datetime.datetime.now()
79  parent_path = os.path.join(log_dir,date.strftime("%d-%m-%Y"))
80 
81  try:
82  os.mkdir(parent_path)
83  except OSError as error:
84  pass
85 
86  file_path = os.path.join(parent_path,date.strftime("%H:%M:%S"))
87 
88  try:
89  os.mkdir(file_path)
90  except OSError as error:
91  pass
92 
93  df = pd.DataFrame(self.log_data,columns=columns_name)
94 
95  try:
96  df.to_csv(os.path.join(file_path,"master_log.csv"))
97  except:
98  rospy.logwarn("saving failed")
99 
100  for name in df['robot_name'].unique():
101  df_tmp = df[df['robot_name'] == name].drop(columns=['robot_name'])
102  try:
103  df_tmp.to_csv(os.path.join(file_path,name+"_log.csv"))
104  except:
105  rospy.logwarn("saving failed")
106 
107  def handle_spawn_robot(self, req):
108  """
109  This service spawns a robot into the gazebo world and starts all the required nodes
110  Error checking is done to ensure no 2 robot with the same name exists
111  """
112  try:
113  # Check if robot exist
114  rospy.wait_for_service('/gazebo/get_model_properties',5.0)
115  gazebo_model_srv = rospy.ServiceProxy('/gazebo/get_model_properties', GetModelProperties)
116  res = gazebo_model_srv(req.robot_name)
117  if(res.success):
118  return MultiRobotSimSpawnRobotResponse("Robot has already been spawned")
119 
120  # Spawn robot
121  command = "roslaunch multi_robot_sim spawn.launch namespace:={name} x_pos:={x} y_pos:={y} yaw:={yaw}".format(name=req.robot_name,x=req.x,y=req.y,yaw=req.yaw)
122 
123  args = shlex.split(command)
124  subprocess.Popen(args)
125  rospy.loginfo("Running " + command)
126  return MultiRobotSimSpawnRobotResponse("Spawned")
127 
128  except rospy.ServiceException as e:
129  print("Service call failed: %s"%e)
130  return MultiRobotSimSpawnRobotResponse("Failed")
131 
132  def handle_del_robot(self, req):
133  """
134  This service despawn a robot from the gazebo world and shutdown all the required nodes
135  Error checking is done to ensure no the robot exists before deleting
136  """
137 
138  try:
139  # Check if robot exist
140  rospy.wait_for_service('/gazebo/get_model_properties',5.0)
141 
142  gazebo_model_srv = rospy.ServiceProxy('/gazebo/get_model_properties', GetModelProperties)
143  gazebo_delete_model_srv = rospy.ServiceProxy('/gazebo/delete_model', DeleteModel)
144 
145  res = gazebo_model_srv(req.robot_name)
146  if(not res.success):
147  return MultiRobotSimRobotResponse("Robot does not exist")
148 
149  # Despawn robot
150  gazebo_delete_model_srv(req.robot_name)
151 
152  # Kill node
153  ros_nodes = rosnode.get_node_names(req.robot_name)
154  rosnode.kill_nodes(ros_nodes)
155 
156  # Remove from history
157  if(req.robot_name in self.history):
158  del self.history[req.robot_name]
159 
160  return MultiRobotSimRobotResponse("Robot deleted")
161 
162  except rospy.ServiceException as e:
163  print("Service call failed: %s"%e)
164  return MultiRobotSimRobotResponse("Failed")
165 
166 
167  def handle_robot_status(self, req):
168  """
169  This service returns the robots status
170  Error checking is done to ensure that the specified robot exists
171  """
172 
173  if(req.robot_name == ""):
174  ret_json = json.dumps(self.history)
175  return MultiRobotSimRobotResponse(ret_json)
176 
177  if(req.robot_name not in self.history):
178  return MultiRobotSimRobotResponse("Robot does not exist")
179 
180  result = {req.robot_name : self.history.pop(req.robot_name)}
181  ret_json = json.dumps(result)
182  return MultiRobotSimRobotResponse(ret_json)
183 
184 
185  def handle_status(self, msg):
186  """
187  The callback functtion subscribes to the status topic
188  Robot status is updates into a dictionary and logged into a list
189  """
190  # Add robot data to history
191  lnglat_pos = self.gg.convertToLngLat((msg.position.x,msg.position.y))
192  self.history[msg.robot_id] = {
193  "status_code" : msg.status,
194  "status" : MovebaseStatus(msg.status).name,
195  "position" : (msg.position.x,msg.position.y),
196  "lnglat_pos" : lnglat_pos
197  }
198 
199  self.log_data.append([datetime.datetime.now().timestamp(),msg.robot_id,msg.status,MovebaseStatus(msg.status).name,(msg.position.x,msg.position.y),lnglat_pos])
200 
201 if __name__ == "__main__":
202  rospy.init_node('robot_management_service')
203  try:
204  BackendService()
205  rospy.loginfo("shutting down")
206  except rospy.ROSInterruptException:
207  pass
